name: Cucumber-Basil Lemonade With Lemongrass
description: Thai flavors of basil and lemongrass combine with cooling cucumber in this mildly savory but totally drinkably tart lemonade variation.
recipeIngredient: 1 medium cucumber, cut into rough chunks
2 stalks lemongrass, bottom 4 inches only, roughly chopped
1 cup fresh juice from 10 to 12 lemons
Cucumber slices and basil leaves for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cucumbers, lemongrass, basil, lemon juice, sugar, and salt in a blender. Blend on high speed until smooth, about 1 minute. Strain through a fine mesh strainer into a pitcher. Discard solids. Add cold water and whisk to combine. Add ice. Serve in ice-filled glasses garnished with cucumber slices and basil leaves.
